metadata.name: JerrY Alpha Badge #1/222
metadata.description:
Total number of badges: 222 pieces  

Badge quantity composition: 111 can be obtained through incineration* and 111 through box opening  

*Incineration : Two keys can be incinerated to obtain one badge, proceeding with FCFS  

Box : Distribution method and quantity will be announced later  
  

  ==  
  ==  

  
Benefits  

Badge holder by 'Incineration' : Additional giveaway entries x 30 for all the raffles & Airdrop raffle ticket for 'Discord 50K' event (worth 0.2ETH)  

Badge holders via box opening : Additional giveaway entries x 30 for all the raffles (However, airdrop raffle tickets are not applicable as box distribution will be carried out as a 50K event)  

In other words, incineration holders can receive additional entries earlier and can win lottery tickets  

Thank you for your continued interest,  

I will notify you of more details later.
